description:
Using 2011.3~d4~20110804.1377-0ubuntu0ppa1~natty1, the injected /etc/network/interfaces file on libvirt compute nodes ends up with a malformed dns-nameservers  parameters, ie:

auto eth1
iface eth1 inet static
        address 11.0.0.3
        netmask 255.255.255.128
        broadcast 11.0.0.127
        gateway 11.0.0.1
        dns-nameservers [u'8.8.4.4']
title: dns-nameservers in injected interfaces file not formatted correctly

comments.content:
Using 2011.3~d4~20110804.1377-0ubuntu0ppa1~natty1, the injected /etc/network/interfaces file on libvirt compute nodes ends up with a malformed dns-nameservers  parameters, ie:

auto eth1
iface eth1 inet static
        address 11.0.0.3
        netmask 255.255.255.128
        broadcast 11.0.0.127
        gateway 11.0.0.1
        dns-nameservers [u'8.8.4.4']
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gandelman-a
